titleStmt.title: The step-mother a tragi-comedy acted with great aplause at the theatre in Little Lincolns-Inne-Fields by His Highness the Duke of York's servants.
titleStmt.author: Stapylton, Robert, Sir, d. 1669.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Streater, and are to be sold by Timothy Twyford ...,
